column2: My name is Derrick. I am captain of guard and defender of this village.
It's people like you that make me want to quit my job. Get lost.
Don't waste my time with stuff like this.
You did good with this one.
It's people like you that make this town worth defending. Thank you.
Hmph. Saw the posting? Thanks kid.
You're welcome in our town... but don't go causing any trouble.
column3: I make the rounds around the village every day to make sure it is safe.
